website_summaries.verdict: The SOL Republic Jax In-Ear headphones deliver powerful, deep low frequency response in an affordable design for bass-lovers on budgets.
pros: Powerful audio performance with deep lows and almost no distortion at maximum volumes
Inline remote control and microphone for mobile devices
cons: Very bass-heavy and lacking in higher frequency definition
Cable thump will be annoying to some

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Not 100% compatible with Android
customer_reviews.text: These arrived much earlier than expected. It was clearly marked on the box that these are made for i Phone, not Android (see image). So I wasn't that surprised to discover that the cables volume controls didn't work. In my opinion this was not made clear in the Amazon product description, so be warned. Other than that, there was a bit of crackling at first that then stopped and the sound quality is pretty good on the whole. They came nicely packaged so no complaints there, although it would have been nice to include a small clip. I'll update this review if I notice any quality issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound, size, and qualilty.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brand because I already knew it. The sound is fantastic, and they are really durable. I use the all the time, even for jogging out, which accelerates the wear of the phones. My ears are very tiny, and most of the in-ear phones are to big for my ears, to the point of hurting and not staying there for a long. These are just the perfect fit for small ears. And I reiterate the quality of sound, I don't know all the characteristics and definition of sounds, but I've tried different 'big brands' and definitely this one competes with the biggest one.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Heat set of earphones
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for almost 2 weeks now and have loved them, delivery was very quick. The earphones are well built and do not feel cheap at all. They have a very good cable that prevents them from getting tangled and is very effective. I would recommend these highly to anyone who listens to any music with bass in it such as dance, house, electro or dubstep because they produce a great amount of bass for earphones. They would also be great for any other type of music.
customer_reviews.author: owen evans

customer_reviews.title: Well I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for 6 months now, they are still going strong and haven't broken. I like the sound quality, I guess the bass could be better but for the price they are good. The buds aren't as good as they could be, and if you listen for music several hours at a time I'd recommend looking elsewhere, but if you're like me and listen <2hr at a time you shouldn't experience any problems. The only super frustrating thing is the buttons, they're designed for Apple products and will not work properly in any other device (Nexus 4/Zune HD here) which is annoying. But overall, for the price they're well worth a buy.
customer_reviews.author: reviwerNo.548

customer_reviews.title: Right earphone died in just over a month
customer_reviews.text: 39 days after i bought them, the right earphone died (Amazon has a 30 day return policy). Bearing in mind i only use these on my 20 minute commute to work I would have expected much more from them and SOL Republic for they're durability.
customer_reviews.author: HazzaT

customer_reviews.title: it was one of those annoying situations where you had to fiddle with the wire ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried using it with Galaxy S6 Edge (Android) but the volume up/down buttons didn't work. Which I am not entirely too fussed about because I just got used it. The problem was that it stopped working after roughly a month of usage. it didn't stop completely, it was one of those annoying situations where you had to fiddle with the wire in order to get it working properly.
customer_reviews.author: GIVE-ME-CHICKEN

customer_reviews.title: Broken in less than two months!
customer_reviews.text: Right headphones has died after less than two months of daily use. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: DK00050

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality but....
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but the cylindrical shape wouldn't stay in my ear so can't use them.
customer_reviews.author: Dynamicworm

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that these dont fully work with Android but a good head phone and really cut the outside sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wire on the earphones are very sensitive as I only ...
customer_reviews.text: Wire on the earphones are very sensitive as I only had them for a week and the sound is not fuzzy due to the connection in the wire.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Scott

customer_reviews.title: Poor value
customer_reviews.text: Remote stopped working after a few months. Poor durability for the price.
customer_reviews.author: GuyStephenson

customer_reviews.title: Broken!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this headphones, sound quality is good however these are so cheaply made, after 3 days the plastic cover of the R ear is cracked and the whole thing is coming apart, awful! Returning them straight away.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Really good sound and less tangle to the cables.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are fairly comfortable to wear, the buds themselves are a more plastic than rubber but still fine to have in your ears for a few hours. The sound quality was actually higher than I was expecting while some may prefer more bass I like the level it was at as it didn't seem to drown out any of the other levels. This does depend on the type of music you like of course and personal preference. I like the style the colour is nice and the flat cables seem to make it harder to get tangled which I really liked.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy & Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Some nice touches do not dispel the overall feeling of flimsiness about these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Thisset of in-ear headphones by SOL Republic are OK, but to me, at an Amazon price of £30 plus, not great value for money. They work fine, the sound is good, and I like the rubberised cables which, as they say, are tangle resistant. However, there is an overall flimsiness to them which makes feel that they'd be very easily damaged. They supply spare rubber in-ear pieces, which is a nice touch, and they certainly stay in my ears fine. The mic button / interruptor mechanism works fine too. Like I said, my one big doubt about them is the feeling of flimsiness.
customer_reviews.author: Og Oggilby

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper products are just as good.
customer_reviews.text: The sound from these is reasonable - to me it sounds no better than some of the cheaper earphones I've used, although of course they can be very variable. The cord doesn't tangle, being flat, but to me the flat blue plastic does look rather cheap - although it a personal taste issue. The earbuds provided fitted my ears well, and were comfortable, and there are other sizes included. The control works well for volume and stopping the music, but I haven't been able to use the mic yet.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Moore

customer_reviews.title: but give easily as good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit more expensive than other ones in the range which, to be honest, is part of the reason I've knocked a star off. I've been trying another pair in the range which are much less expensive, but give easily as good sound quality. They do have a nice design feature, though, in that the flat cables don't tangle so easily as the round cables. Good, with a but.
customer_reviews.author: R. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but....
customer_reviews.text: Says the headphones come with connector that you connect onto to the phone on the side and not upwards, this avoid damadging the cable, but not came with the upwards option and clearly it stopped working after a couple months which was a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: The Best Headphones EVER!
customer_reviews.text: WOW, and I mean WOW. These are the single best headphones I've ever had the pleasure to use. The sound quality is absolutely amazing and crystal clear, picking up every note and nuance imaginable. They are wonderful for music, radio drama, comedy and sports commentaries, you will miss nothing with these headphones. The ear plugs are comfortable and the come with replacements and different sizes and the flex is thick and sturdy but very flexible and strong, these will not tangle up easily. It's a pity they have been discontinued and I don't understand why because they are brilliant. Get they while you still can, you won't regret it I promise you.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to wear and in an unusual colour, these earphones are of a good quality. The sound is average I would say, the base is nothing special, which is reflected in the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joachim + Suleyman

product_meta.title: SOL Republic Jax In-Ear Headphones – Noise Isolating, Tangle-Free Earphones with Mic + 3 Button Control, High Quality Sound, Powerful Bass, Vibrant Vocals, 4x Earbuds Sizes Perfect Fit – White/Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:White/BlackWe believe music has the power to move you, touch you and inspire you. A good song can help you run faster, think clearer and live better. For every great moment, there is a song that goes with it - this is your “Soundtrack Of Life” (SOL) and we’re committed to making it better through sound, style, and technology.

Jax In-Ear Headphones

Jax were created to put high quality sound and style within reach. Designed from the ground up, Jax are powered by newly developed i2 Sound Engines that deliver powerful sound with great bass and clear highs. Engineered for everyday use, a wide flat cable eliminates the tangle most music lovers dread. Style and sound go hand in hand, which is why Jax come in an array of colors and include four sizes of ear tips in matching colors for a perfect fit

BOX CONTAINS
i2 Sound Engines;3-Button Mic + Music Control;Tangle Free cable;4 Ear Tip Sizes
feature_bullets: Sound You Can Feel: i2 Sound Engines, provide a powerful, high quality sound that will exceed all expectations

Tangle-Free Cable: With a newly designed flat and lightweight cable, you will spend less time handling your headphones and more time listening to music. Just pull them out and put them on without any hassles

Mic + Music Control: Control your calls and your music with the touch of a button. Our three-button remote lets you adjust the volume, skip music and answer/hang-up calls. The high clarity mic captures every word possible
Listen In Comfort: With four sizes of ear tips, you’re sure to get a comfortable fit and perfect seal for hours of music bliss
